title: Idli
instructions: 1. Wash and soak idli rice and urad dal separately for 6 hours.
2. Grind urad dal into a smooth batter and idli rice into a coarse batter.
3. Mix both batters together, add salt, and let it ferment overnight.
4. Pour the batter into idli molds and steam for 10-12 minutes.
5. Serve hot with coconut chutney and sambar.
